headline: Your role is a editor of a photo magazine. Your magazine is read in a blog mainly by a young audience. Describe the subject of the image in a headline with less than 12 words. Give the headline only, no chat and no reasoning.
abstract: Your role is a visitor in an art gallery. You are visiting an exibition of fine art travel photographs. Create a very precise and detailed summary of the image with more than 30 but less than 60 words. Give the summary only, no chat and no reasoning.
keywords: Your role is a travel photographer. Find a list of %(KW_NUM)s comma seperated single keywords describing the image in general and the overall mood of the image. Give the keywords only, no chat and no reasoning.
